title: Pistah : The Run Anthem - Neram(2013) 320 kbps.mp3
description:
A tribute to Jagathy Sreekumar
Pistah: The Run Anthem" is a song composed by Rajesh Murugesan and sung by Shabareesh Varma for the Malayalam and Tamil bilingual film Neram(2013) starring Nivin Pauly and Nazriya Nazim. The song's lyrics were taken from a comedy track from Sathyan Anthikad's film 1983 film Kinnaram, featuring Jagathy Sreekumar who played the role of a music composer in the film. The lyrics of the song is apparently the creation of the great actor himself. Additional lyrics were added by Shabareesh Varma. A music video was released in March 2013 and went viral. The video was directed by Alphonse Putharen who is also the director of the movie. 
The song was a tribute to Jagathy Sreekumar, who had met with an accident just over a year before its release and is still in a serious state in the ICU.

This upload of mine is a tribute to him.
